{% extends "templates/item_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon" %} {% set library_name = "Concepts" %} {% set item_name = "stream_writable" %} {% block nested %}../{% endblock %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.defined("cmoon.concepts", github_url_src + "/concepts/concepts.ixx")}} {{macros.overload_set([ " template concept stream_writable = requires(const T& t, S& s) { { s << t }; }; " ])}}

The concept stream_writable<T, S> is satisfied if and only if there is a stream output operator (operator<<) overloaded for stream S and value T.

{% endblock %}
